lead_paragraph: Approvals for first-of-a-kind drugs climbed last year, pushing the annual tally of new United States drugs to its highest level in 19 years.

headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Drug Approvals Climb to Highest Level Since 1996
headline.main: F.D.A. Drug Approvals Climb to Highest Level Since 1996

snippet: Approvals for first-of-a-kind drugs climbed last year, pushing the annual tally of new United States drugs to its highest level in 19 years.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approved 45 drugs with never-before-sold ingredients in 2015, highest number since 1996.
